comments.author: Linkcott18
comments.body:
Braces require periodic adjustment, and sometimes changing bits. I would not recommend using a different orthodontist for follow-up than braces. 

That means either using some here for everything, or committing to returning frequently (6 8 times per year?) to your orthodontist in another country.

If you need them for medical reasons, they can be partially funded by the national health system.
